node.description: A python library for multi omics included bulk, single cell and spatial RNA-seq analysis.
node.name: OmicVerse: A single pipeline for exploring the entire transcriptome universe

node.description: A composite regression neural network for latent timing prediction of single-cell RNA-seq data.
node.name: scLTNN: single cell latent time neuron network

node.description: A metacell-based regression weighting model that unbiasedly studies the transforming and dependent factors that influence cell lineage development.
node.name: CellFateGenie: Unraveling the Secrets of Cellular Fate Determination
